nodes.text: Monta Drai was a male Mandalorian slaver who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. He and a group of Mandalorian mercenaries were hired by the Empire to capture many Balmorran villagers and turning them into slaves. He encountered a Republic spacer who was sent by Ambassador Alya Selray to rescue the villagers and end the threat once and for all. Monta and his men engaged the individual, but were all defeated.
